45.heading: Phone Bills.
45.title: Dry Spell
45.author: written and illustrated by Ken Krekeler.
notes: 1 v. : col. ill. ; 24 cm.

Summary (from SkyRiver): Tom Ferris lives in a world of super-heroes: vibrant colors that streak across the sky, that hurl themselves over rooftops at night. They are commonplace. But Tom doesn't notice that world anymore, because his world is made up of spreadsheets, of phone bills, of software and coffee and button-down shirts. Long ago, Tom had been someone special. Today, Tom has become someone else. A respectable, quiet man with a decent job and a dead dream. But each night, he lies awake, wishing for the chance to do things differently, to be the man he really is. One day, Tom gets his wish. And the world will never forget him again!
